tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( 
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  location TEXT, 
  temperature FLOAT, 
  humidity FLOAT, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_conditions ( 
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    location VARCHAR(255), 
    temperature FLOAT, 
    humidity FLOAT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE historical_sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_conditions (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(50),
    unit VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES environmental_conditions(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);
